projects_github.title: Code Runner
projects_github.description: Code runner was my final project carried out in the last year of my high school integrated with software development. A platform where there are programming challenges, in which the user can solve them and see the result in real time.

projects_github.title: Dashboard - Stock Control
projects_github.description: A dashboard for stock control, where the user can add, remove, and view products in stock.

projects_github.title: React Kanban
projects_github.description: An application of Kanban board developed with React, where the user has tasks of low, medium, and high priority.

projects_github.title: Personal Finances
projects_github.description: An application to manage personal finances, allowing the user to add income and expenses.

projects_github.title: Calculator
projects_github.description: A simple calculator developed with Javascript.

greetings: Hello, my name is Enzo Feltrin! I plan and develop web and back-end applications
greetings_short: I am a fullstack developer. I like to think of good ideas and turn them into code
subtitle_4: Interested in my work? Get in touch!
name: Name
about_me_text: I'm a developer who always look for building apps that add value to people's lives by solving everyday problems, always writing clean, scalable, and readable code.
my_stack: My main stack for front-end development consists of React, Javascript, Typescript, and NextUI. I also have knowledge in API development and containerization, as well as in relational and non-relational databases.
call_me: Found my portfolio interesting? Let's schedule a call to discuss projects and ideas in our careers!
a_little_information: Here is a little information about me!
about_me: My name is Enzo Feltrin, I am currently 18 years old and I study Analysis and Development of Systems at Fatec Americana. Since a very young age I became interested in computers, and this led me to become a fullstack developer. My passion is to help the everyday life of other people with my knowledge in technology, such as developing interactive interfaces and robust and scalable systems.
academic_title_1: High school with a technical course in Software development
academic_title_2: Higher education in Analysis and Software development
academic_description_1: I completed my high school at Etec Polivalente de Americana, and in addition to high school, I had an integrated course in Analysis and Software development, in partnership with the multinational company IBM.
academic_description_2: Currently pursuing a degree in ADS at Fatec Americana, this opportunity was given to me through school projects that accounted for hours for IBM. Upon completing 200 hours, students enter Fatec.
professional_description_1: I worked as a waiter in a buffet, which greatly enhanced my communication, networking, and other soft skills. It was a valuable experience for interacting with the public and resolving situations.
professional_description_2: I did simple freelances, focusing on how web sales work. I also gained experience with calculations and delivering services according to the client's briefing.
